I have a budget of 500 per day for each hotel, and please recommend me the hotel with the highest rating in Paris and London.

To solve this problem we will need to follow these steps:

1) Find best rated hotels under $500/day in Paris
2) Find best rated hotels under $500/day London
3) Calculate total cost of a stay at each pair of hotels and select one with the lowest price.
